definition: study of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]
easy to learn
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"

to learn/to study/to imitate/science/-ology

sentences.english: Part six deals with the appraisal of Yang Wanli's Yi-ology.
sentences.chinese: 第六部分是对杨万里易学思想的评价。

sentences.english: This method has the advantages of simplicity, accuracy and is easy to generalize.
sentences.chinese: 该法简便易学，恢速准确，容易推广。

sentences.english: What sport can learn and easy to understand, ages beneficial to everyone?
sentences.chinese: 什么体育项目能易学易懂，老少皆宜对大家都有益？

sentences.english: This coin trick is easy to learn.
sentences.chinese: 这个硬币魔术简单易学。

sentences.english: "National examination system to learn by teaching" expert members of the first series of the pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 《全国易学考试统用教材》第一辑的编审专家委员。

sentences.english: Our teacher said that gardening is enjoyable, and easy to learn.
sentences.chinese: 老师说园艺学是令人愉快的，而且简单易学。

sentences.english: It's very easy to learn and operate the system with online help subsystem.
sentences.chinese: 本系统操作方便，易学易用，并配有强大的联机帮助。

sentences.english: It has a high place in Yi learning of Song dynasty and has a remarkable impact on later generations.
sentences.chinese: 在宋代易学史上占有一定地位，对后世产生重要影响。

sentences.english: Breathing exercises are easy to learn.
On the other hand PHP has always been considered a language with few features that was easy to learn.
sentences.chinese: 而另一方面PHP一直被认为易学的功能较少。

sentences.english: That's it. High learnability, with this few concepts.
sentences.chinese: 这些概念都是高度易学的。
每个字母将代表安易学。

sentences.english: Chen Tuan's Yi thought gave impetus to famine alchemy in the sense of theory.
sentences.chinese: 陈传易学给宋元参同阴丹术带来了理论推动。

sentences.english: I hope this tutorial is easily utilised, especially by designers.
sentences.chinese: 我希望这个教程易学易做，尤其是对于创意者们来说。

sentences.english: Setting of the knife mold is rapid, accurate and easy-to- leam .
sentences.chinese: 刀模设定快捷准确，简单易学。

sentences.english: The specialized information exchange of Iching and the landscape architecture and geomancy.
sentences.chinese: 易学和景观建筑风水学的专门化信息的交流。

definition: The Book of Changes ("I Ching")
divination/divinatory art
Zi Wei Dou Shu, a form of Chinese fortune-telling
Confucian study of ethics/study of Daoism/school for Daoism in Tang and Song times/Daoist magic/another name for 理學|理学, rational learning of Song dynasty neo-Confucianism
divination based on the eight characters of one's birth date
physiognomy
Daoist School of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC), based on the teachings of Laozi or Lao-tze 老子[Lao3 zi3] (c. 500 BC-) and Zhuangzi 庄子 (369-286 BC)
fate/predestination/divinatory art
easy to understand
the Absolute or Supreme Ultimate, the source of all things according to some interpretations of Chinese mythology
another name for Book of Changes (I Ching) 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]
to have one's fortune read/system of fortune telling based on a person's date and time of birth, according to 干支 (sexagenary cycle)
Yi Zhuan, commentary on the "Book of Changes" or "I Ching" 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]
wide-ranging and profound/broad and deep
Buddhist doctrine/Buddhist studies
divination
